name: stringSome
description: This function calls a given closure/function with every element in a given string and returns true as soon as the callback condition is met.

params.name: callback
params.description: The closure function that is executed for each element in the string.

lucee.notes: This function is being added in Lucee 6. It is similar to other `some()` functions.

links.title: Lucee - LDEV-3154 Ticket to add stringSome
links.description: Lucee ticket to add function in Lucee 6.

examples.title: Full function
examples.description: Are any of the characters in the string greater than our condition?

examples.title: Member function
examples.description: Are any of the characters in the string greater than our condition?
